metadata.name: Spirit Corp. (Re-Render 1)
metadata.description:
12 sec looping mp4 + original audio

A dark exploration into humanityâ€™s fixation with the digital: in a possible future a human finds herself re-rendered into cyberspace, recoded into a virtual being. As she begins to explore her new form it dissolves and swells into an inky fluid. Struggling against the liquid she momentarily emerges, merged into a flower, before being pulled back into the inky depths.

This artefact is spawned from 'Spirit Corp.'.
